5A3B4CBE.Line1.941B7: My neighbors, I beg you, the burnings must stop. The Zakarum are not ridding the land of heretics, they are destroying the people who have loved and protected you for generations.

F42FC640.Line3.941B7: It is we, the witches of the swamp, who hold the darkness at bay. Burning us will bring no Light to Hawezar.
